key.name: panel-position
key.description: Position of the ping indicator in the top panel (left or right)

key.name: target-host
key.description: The IP address or hostname to ping for network monitoring

key.name: threshold-low
key.description: Ping times below this value (in ms) will be displayed in white

key.name: threshold-medium
key.description: Ping times above low but below this value (in ms) will be displayed in orange

key.name: threshold-high
key.description: Ping times above this value (in ms) will be displayed in red
